529 Tiles: Automatically and immediately unlocks all tiles on the map when you start a new city (or load an existing one).
Adds the additional tiles as immediately-available tile unlocks when you first start a new city (all milestones will add their usual amount of tile unlocks on top of this).
Provide extra tiles at final milestone
Adds the additional tile unlocks to the final milestone.
Allocates the additional tile unlocks across all regular game milestones, in proportion to the normal amount for each milestone.
If this is selected then no starting tiles will be automatically unlocked when starting a new game. Instead you can choose your own starting tiles (the first nine tiles will be free to purchase).
The game's default tile upkeep cost will be multiplied by this percentage.  Set this to zero to completely disable tile upkeep.
Resets all 529 Tiles mod settings to default.
Reset all 529 Tiles settings to default?  This cannot be undone.
Re-locks all unlocked tiles; you can immediately re-purchase tiles up to the limit that you've earned.
